title: Setup-Manjaro
content:
Packages

```
pamac upgrade && pamac install xbindkeys curl
```
```
sudo pacman -S base-devel
```
```
pamac install vlc guake gimp smartmontools mplayer caffeine xautomation git gparted unrar zip unzip telegram-desktop gedit tlp tlpui acpi_call-dkms acpi_call android-tools jre8-openjdk-headless jre8-openjdk jdk8-openjdk openjdk8-doc openjdk8-src snapd sshpass gnome-power-manager ocs-url tlp tlpui
```
<hr>


TLP
```
systemctl enable tlp --now
```
<hr>

Java
```
sudo pacman -S jre11-openjdk-headless jre11-openjdk jdk11-openjdk openjdk11-doc openjdk11-src
archlinux-java status
archlinux-java set ...
```
<hr>


Nautilus
```
/home/unifino/.local/share/nautilus-python
```
<hr>


Extentions

```
https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/1082/cpufreq/
```
```
https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/1319/gsconnect/
```
```
https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/1475/battery-time/
```
<hr>

Cursor
```
https://www.gnome-look.org/p/1360254/
```
<hr>
Codium

Best Way:Just Download The Source Package, Extract it and Paste it Here:
```
/usr/share/vscodium-bin
```

Old Way:
```
lsudo systemctl enable --now snapd.socket
```
```
sudo ln -s /var/lib/snapd/snap /snap

```
```
sudo snap install codium --classic
```

Link
```
https://github.com/VSCodium/vscodium/releases
```
<hr>

Trim Storage

```
sudo fstrim -v /
```
<hr>

xbindkeys


```
gedit ~/.xbindkeysrc
```
```
# Copy / Cut with ctrl-c / ctrl-x
"~/Public/Apps/bind_copy.sh"
    b:8

# Paste with ctrl-v
"~/Public/Apps/bind_paste.sh"
    b:9 + Release

"xte 'keydown Alt_L' 'key Tab' 'keyup Alt_L'"
    b:6

"xte 'key Super_L'"
    b:7

```

```
killall -HUP xbindkeys
xbindkeys
``` 

copy
```
#! /bin/bash

t=$( cat ~/.t.txt );

if [ $t = 2 ]; then
    hdparm -Y /dev/sda;
fi;

if [ $t = 1 ]; then
    xte 'keydown Control_L' 'key x' 'keyup Control_L';
else
    xte 'keydown Control_L' 'key c' 'keyup Control_L';
fi;

t=$(( t+1 ));
echo $t > ~/.t.txt;
sleep .5;
echo 0 > ~/.t.txt;
```

paste
```
#! /bin/bash

u=$(cat ~/.u.txt);
if [ $u = 1 ]; then 
    xte 'keydown Control_L' 'key z' 'keyup Control_L' 
    xte 'key Super_L';
else
    xte 'keydown Control_L' 'key v' 'keyup Control_L'; 
fi;
u=$((u+1));
echo $u > ~/.u.txt;
sleep 0.3;
echo 0 > ~/.u.txt
```
<hr>

NodeJs
```
curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.35.3/install.sh | bash
```
```
nvm install node
npm install -g nativescript
sudo update-alternatives --config java
```
```
nvm ls
nvm alias default xxxxxx
```
<hr>

Mirror
```
#! /bin/bash

WINDOW_ID=$(xwininfo | awk '/Window.id/{print $4}')
x11vnc -viewonly -nopw -avahi -id $WINDOW_ID >/dev/null 2>&1 &
```
On Android:
connect to the Desktop: [xxx.xxx.xx.xx]:5900

<hr>

pamac upgrade && pamac install xbindkeys curl

```
#! /bin/bash

t=$( cat ~/.t.txt );

#! /bin/bash

WINDOW_ID=$(xwininfo | awk '/Window.id/{print $4}')

```
On Android:
connect to the Desktop: [xxx.xxx.xx.xx]:5900

<hr>


Alias
```
gedit ~/.zshrc
```

```
# .. NVM
export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm"
[ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh"
[ -s "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion"

# .. Androud SDK
export ANDROID_HOME=/home/$USER/Public/Android/sdk-tools-linux
export ANDROID_SDK_ROOT=$ANDROID_HOME
export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_SDK_ROOT/tools/bin
export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/tools:$ANDROID_HOME/platforms-tools
alias emulator="sh $ANDROID_HOME/tools/emulator"

# .. Proxy
alias pon="gsettings set org.gnome.system.proxy mode 'manual'"
alias poff="gsettings set org.gnome.system.proxy mode 'auto'"
alias pset="gsettings set org.gnome.system.proxy.http host '$ip' && gsettings set org.gnome.system.proxy.https host '$ip' && gsettings set org.gnome.system.proxy.ftp host '$ip'"

# .. Tor
alias d="gsettings set org.gnome.system.proxy.socks host '' && gsettings set org.gnome.system.proxy.socks port 0"
alias s="gsettings set org.gnome.system.proxy.socks host 'localhost' && gsettings set org.gnome.system.proxy.socks port 9050"
alias r="sudo systemctl reload tor"
alias i="curl http://icanhazip.com/ && torsocks curl http://icanhazip.com/"

# .. Projects
alias 1='read -p "Hi, Project: " project && read -sp "ok, passKEY: " key && echo "" && echo "ok, ..." && cd ~/Documents/$project/ && tns build android --release --key-store-path fitored.keystore --key-store-password $key --key-store-alias "fitored" --key-store-alias-password $key && nautilus ~/Documents/$project/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/ && key="wiped" && echo "OK, passKey $key :)" && echo "Bye."'
alias 3='cd ~/Documents/Moshaf/ && ns run android --no-hmr'
alias 5="cd ~/Documents/Parser/ && npm run start"
alias 55="cd ~/Documents/Parser/ && npm run start:watch"
alias 8="~/Public/Apps/mirror.sh"
alias x="x11vnc -R stop"

# .. Others
alias n="~/Public/Apps/boost-note-linux.AppImage"
alias 0="hdparm -Y /dev/sda"
alias b="upower -i /org/freedesktop/UPower/devices/battery_BAT0 |  grep -e energy: -e energy-full -e capacity -e percentage"
alias blind="echo 0 > /sys/class/backlight/intel_backlight/brightness"
alias dev='xmodmap -e "keycode 97 =  underscore backslash" && xmodmap -e "keycode 20 =  equal minus" && xmodmap -e "keycode 10 =  exclam 1" && xmodmap -e "keycode 11 =  quotedbl 2" && xmodmap -e "keycode 12 =  numbersign 3" && xmodmap -e "keycode 13 =  dollar 4" && xmodmap -e "keycode 14 =  percent 5" && xmodmap -e "keycode 15 =  ampersand 6" && xmodmap -e "keycode 16 =  apostrophe 7" && xmodmap -e "keycode 17 =  parenleft 8" && xmodmap -e "keycode 18 =  parenright 9" && xmodmap -e "keycode 132 = bar yen" && xmodmap -e "keycode 34 =  grave at"'
alias nor='xmodmap -e "keycode 97 =  backslash underscore" && xmodmap -e "keycode 20 =  minus equal" && xmodmap -e "keycode 10 =  1 exclam" && xmodmap -e "keycode 11 =  2 quotedbl" && xmodmap -e "keycode 12 =  3 numbersign" && xmodmap -e "keycode 13 =  4 dollar" && xmodmap -e "keycode 14 =  5 percent" && xmodmap -e "keycode 15 =  6 ampersand" && xmodmap -e "keycode 16 =  7 apostrophe" && xmodmap -e "keycode 17 =  8 parenleft" && xmodmap -e "keycode 18 =  9 parenright" && xmodmap -e "keycode 132 = yen bar" && xmodmap -e "keycode 34 =  at grave"'

```

```
source ~/.zshrc
```
<hr>


```

```
source ~/.zshrc
```
<hr>
